website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for young Trolls fans who like to work with their hands and for parents who need to watch their budgets. You get a lot for a low price with this activity set.
pros: Garners praise for keeping kids entertained with a variety of Trolls-based activities
Includes stampers, coloring book, crayons, and puzzle with Troll hair
cons: Missing or damaged pieces upon arrival is the most common complaint about this otherwise impressive set

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: This item is very cute. My 4 year old grand daughter enjoyed the stamps and coloring book. The puzzle is cute but when she put it together, it was missing the last one piece she needed. The package arrived well sealed. An adult opened the plastic, and helped her with the puzzle. We looked for the missing piece thinking it was tossed out with the packaging but it was not there. The puzzle did stay together however.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: She love's it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Christmas, and she is a troll fan. Has kept her busy. She loves the stamps and uses them on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna's Place

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality items!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my niece as part of her third birthday present and she loved it! With her being a big Trolls fan I knew it was going to be a hit. It's a great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan M Lind

customer_reviews.title: Product was perfect for my neice
customer_reviews.text: Product was perfect for my neice. I chose this because she was in to trolls. The package offered 3 different activities.A puzzle, stamps, and coloring book all troll themed. The coloring book even came with crayons. Totally satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Amy

customer_reviews.title: Price too high, not shipped properly.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. $1 stamps, $2 crayons, $3 coloring book, and $3 puzzle. Items were shipped in a large padded envelope, so the puzzle box was smashed when it arrived. I don't usually complain, but very disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CARLA PITTMAN

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I couldve have bought this set at the dollar store and spent a lot less but my 3 year old loved it and thats what counts
customer_reviews.author: Carley_butner

customer_reviews.title: the box that the puzzle came in was pretty smashed so that was a bit disappointing as well
customer_reviews.text: This one was just okay for me. I ordered it for my 3 1/2 year old niece. The puzzle pieces were MUCH smaller than I was anticipating and the main piece with the Troll hair in the center would only fit after all other pieces were in place. Also, the box that the puzzle came in was pretty smashed so that was a bit disappointing as well. The stamps and coloring book were cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Herman

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The crayons were melted.The book is NOT JUMBO.athe puzzle and stamps I had no porblem with but this was a horrible buy
customer_reviews.author: Minidoll

customer_reviews.title: Good but disappointing at the same time
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old loves trolls. Really liked this box set until we tried to do the puzzle and pieces were already missing, now my daughter keeps asking where are the other pieces. Otherwise, all else is good.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter’s birthday and it’s super cute. The only thing was two of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter’s birthday and it’s super cute. The only thing was two of the stamps were leaking so we couldn’t use them. Never seen a stamp like that do that.

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved this item
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this item. There is several things for her to do & the price is well worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Can’t complain about the product for the price. Just wish it would’ve been shipped better. The crayons are all out inside the bag and the boxes were crushed.

customer_reviews.title: Great product greqt value !

customer_reviews.title: Still a nice little add on gift
customer_reviews.text: You could buy all of these items separately and probably pay 1/2 the price. Still a nice little add on gift.

product_meta.title: Dreamworks Trolls Coloring Book, Puzzle and Stamper Activity Set - Include 1 Coloring Book (96 pages) , Trolls Puzzle , 24 Crayola Crayons and 6 Stampers
product_meta.description: This set includes one Coloring Book (96 pages, Cover may vary) , Trolls Puzzle (48 pieces), 24 Crayola Crayons and 6 Stampers. Trolls Coloring book: 96 pages of fun and activities with your favorite trolls characters! Endless hours of activities inside. Perforated pages for easy tear-outs. Cover may vary. Trolls Puzzle: 48-piece Puzzle, Features synthetic troll hair, Puzzle size: 10.3 x 9.1". 6 Stampers: Including 6 cupcake stampers. Great gift and party favor for trolls fans. Factory sealed, Assorted Styles, Each stamper measures 1.5" x 1" . Safe and non-toxic. 24 Crayola Crayons in a box: The 24 non-toxic crayons in this pack feature classic colors, as well as bright, fun shades that help inspire self-expression and imaginative play.
feature_bullets: This set includes one Coloring Book (96 pages, Cover may vary) , Trolls Puzzle (48 pieces), 24 Crayola Crayons and 6 Cupcake Stampers
Trolls Coloring book: 96 pages of fun and activities with your favorite trolls characters Endless hours of activities inside. Perforated pages for easy tear-outs. Cover may vary.
Trolls Puzzle: 48-piece Puzzle, Features synthetic troll hair, Puzzle size: 10.3 x 9.1"
6 Stampers: Including 6 Cupcake stampers. Great party favor for Trolls fans. Assorted Styles, Each stamper measures 1.5" x 1" . Safe and non-toxic
24 Crayola Crayons in a box: The 24 non-toxic crayons in this pack feature classic colors, as well as bright, fun shades that help inspire self-expression and imaginative play.
